attributes.action: We Support Our Community Pub And We Want It Reopened As Soon As Possible.
attributes.additional_details:
Since the new owners and management took over they have changed the place around having a positive effect on the community. It offers a safe and enjoyable environment that is comfortable and friendly for everybody. 
The pub takes an active role in the community, hosting and leading charity events, which not only benefit the local community but all of Liverpool. Sign our petition to show the authorities we support this exemplary establishment and want it reopen as soon as possible.
attributes.background: Due to a freak accident our community pub has been closed down and we want it back. This pub is one of many positive businesses helping with the regeneration of our local community and it's important we have it back as soon as possible.
